name: STSM Render Fixer
description: STSM Render Fixer. Fixes Haberdashery FBO crash, adds Android resource fallback for Haberdashery database, and uses an Android safe-render path for RyoikiTenkai AfterImage to prevent UI freeze while keeping the effect visible (with extra [RYOIKI_DEBUG] diagnostics). Logs with [SRF_DEBUG]/[HABER_DEBUG].
